title: Hardwood-Style Plank Flooring, Storage Units Available, High Ceilings
posting_body: ['Welcome Home!', "Welcome to Vara, a stylish residential community featuring new studio, 1-, 2- and 3-bedroom apartments in San Francisco's Mission District.", 'Spacious layouts and premium amenities welcome you home, along with exceptional service and an ideal location within walking distance to shopping, dining and entertainment options.', 'Are you looking for an apt for rent in San Francisco?', 'Enjoy the perks of interior features such as gourmet kitchens with hardwoodstyle cabinets, stainless steel appliances, and beautiful quartz countertops.', 'Just steps from your door you can take advantage of community features like a tech room for getting work done, a courtyard for socializing and lounging, and a state-of-the-art fitness center for working out.', "Vara is a chic retreat located in one of San Francisco's most desirable neighborhoods.", 'Welcome home.', 'Call Now:', 'show contact info', 'x 83', 'OR Text', '83', 'to', 'show contact info', 'to text with us.', 'Want more info?', 'See the link below:', '<URL>', 'This is a Studio, 1 Bath, approximately 516 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Features', '- Gourmet Kitchen With Hardwood-Style Cabinets In 4 Finish Options And Stainless Steel Basin Sink With Pullout Spray Faucet', '- Walk-In Closets*', '- Variety Of Unique Floorplans, Some Featuring Lofts', 'And / Or Dens', '- Expansive Double Pane Windows', '- Abundant Phone, TV And High-Speed Data Ports', '- Vibrant San Francisco City Views*', '- In-Home Washers And Dryers', '- Hardwood-Style Plank Flooring', '- Quartz Countertops', '- Stainless Steel Appliances Including Dishwasher, Refrigerator, Glass Top Oven And Built-In Microwave', '- High Ceilings', '- Many Floor Plans With Flex Space (Extra Bedroom, Office, Den Or Expanded Living Space)', '- Private Patios Or Balconies*', '*Varies By Floorplan And Location', 'Community Amenities', '- Close To BART And Muni', '- Garage Parking With Car Lockers', '- Clubhouse With Catering Kitchen And Professional-Quality Bar With High End Sound System', '- Free Wi-Fi In Common Area Locations', '- Tech Room / Meeting Room With A Sound-Proof Music Practice Room And A Private Tele-Conference Room', '- Smoke-Free Community', '- Controlled Building Access', '- Courtyard With Social Seating Areas, Barbecue, Lounge & Sunning Hill', '- Storage Units Available', '- Abundant Bicycle Parking And Bike Repair Shop Including Fully Equipped Workbench', '- Easy Access To Bay Bridge And 101 & 280 Freeways', '- Fitness Center With Health Club-Quality Equipment Including Built In Xbox 360 And Kinect System', '- Walking Distance To Vibrant Mission District Shopping, Dining And Entertainment Options', 'Pet Policy', 'Pet Friendly (Restrictions Apply)', 'Office Hours', 'Monday-Friday:9:00AM-6:00PM', 'Saturday:10:00AM-5:00PM', 'Vara', '1600 15th St, San Francisco, CA, 94103', 'This unit is a rental unit subject to the San Francisco Rent Ordinance, which limits evictions without just cause, and which states that any waiver by a tenant of their rights under the Rent Ordinance is void as contrary to public policy.', 'ws4UwRtOeG']
